item.title: MulDA: A Multilingual Data Augmentation Framework for Low-Resource Cross-Lingual NER
item.description: A data augmentation method for NER.

item.description: Data augmentation for low resource tagging.

item.title: LNMap: Departures from Isomorphic Assumption in Bilingual Lexicon Induction Through Non-Linear Mapping in Latent Space
item.description: This paper shows with a semi-supervised algorithm that BLI is more suitable through Non-Linear Mapping (specially for low resource languages).
